fer.gameplay

Class Convoy

  • java.lang.Object
    • fer.gameplay.Convoy

  • public class Convoy
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Evan Stewart A data storage class that holds an inventory of items, weapons, and armor as well as \a quantity of funds. Used to keep track of inventories and for each faction on a map as well as shop inventories.
